argument.name: UXViewBoxName
argument.description: The Id of the ViewBox control or a comma delimited list of ViewBox Ids to refresh.

discussion.p: Refreshes a ViewBox control. If the ViewBox is based on a SQL query, a callback is made to re-execute the query. Contrast this with the <viewBoxObject>.refresh() method, which simply redraws the ViewBox using the existing ViewBox data.
If you want to refresh ultiple ViewBoxes on a single Ajax callback, you can pass a comma delimited list of ViewBox Ids.
